original: Englund, Otto Albin, konsul. Var-berg, f. 11/1/75 i Ljushult, Älvsb. 1., av Anders E. o. Anna Davidsdotter. — Res. t. Tyskl., Österr., Ital. o. Frankr. Grund. A-B Kinna Yllefabr. 12, dir. där 12-21, grund. Varbergs Tricotfabr. A-B, verkst. dir. där 22-33, deläg. i Englo A-B i Varberg sed. 46. Ordf. i styr. f. detta föret. sed. 46, ordf. i lokalstyr. f. Smål. Ensk. Bank 23-30, var. mångårig led. av hamnstyr. i Varberg. Medl. av Odd Fellow. Hobbies: bilresor, fiske. RPrRÖO.
translated: Englund, Otto Albin, consul. Varberg, b. 11/1/75 in Ljushult, Älvsborgs län, son of Anders E. and Anna Davidsdotter. - Traveled to Germany, Austria, Italy, and France. Founder of AB Kinna Yllefabrik in 1912, director there from 1912-1921, founder of Varbergs Tricotfabrik AB, executive director there from 1922-1933, co-owner of Englo AB in Varberg since 1946. Chairman of the board of directors for Englo AB since 1946, chairman of the local board of Smålands Enskilda Bank from 1923-1930, and served as a long-time board member of the Varberg port authority. Member of the Odd Fellows organization. Hobbies: car trips and fishing. Knight of the Royal Order of the Polar Star. Note: Marriage date not specified.

award.name: Royal Order of the Polar Star
